lender.name: Marley
lender.loan_because: I love that microlending offers credit opportunities to some of the people who most need it. And now Kiva lets me feel even more a part of this world-changing process. I'm pleased that my contributions here will not dissipate but accumulate.This is my idea of a meaningful portfolio.

lender.name: Ben & Susan
lender.loan_because: It's a small and simple act to try and be of some help.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have spent many years trying to find investors in my ideas and have them tell me reasons why I shouldn't receive funding. It feels good to be on the other side and say yes to funding requests.
lender.occupational_info: I have a website business that tries to help young entrepreneurs find mentors and build skills to become successful in their careers.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I was given opportunities that other people should have, too.

lender.name: Rebecca & Warren
lender.occupational_info: R-owns and runs a coffee house and resturant W-is a professor who researches addictions

lender.name: Tristram
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves fair access to capital.

lender.name: Dwight
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans are an effective way to spead God's grace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I plan public transportation services in a community of 100,000 people.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I want to help, regardless of color and religion.
lender.occupational_info: I write music for film and TV.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can. I enjoy using my wealth to assist others and these micro-loans seem to be a great way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software developers around the world for a large technology company.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: microcredit to small business people is a great way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students in high school and help them with their studies.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: It is a positive way to fight poverty
lender.occupational_info: Writing and publishing (personal essays)and technical editing for a non-profit working to improve nutrition in developing countries. Former dairy farmer

lender.name: Amy L Clark
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are essential for empowering communities, helping individuals lift themselves out of poverty, and fighting the control of multinational corporations which are interested in profit at the expense of humanity and morality.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and critical thinking skills to all kinds of people. I also write stories.

lender.name: L A
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Reflecting on the universe and my place in it.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: with this small gesture I can improve the lives of others in a real and measurable way.

lender.name: Espy
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of cash to donate, but lending small amounts can do tremendous good.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I stand up and try to tell jokes to make people laugh. But, I do have a "day job" where I earn my living. This involves health care administration in a very large city.

lender.name: Mariel
lender.loan_because: There have been times in our family's life when we have been blessed by the kindness of strangers. Kiva offers a wonderful opportunity for me to give someone a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: While being a wife and mom to 4 sons, I went to college for 4 years, then taught students ages 13-15. I recently retired from teaching and now enjoy volunteer work, swimming and reading.

lender.name: Gini
lender.loan_because: It seems like an efficient and effective way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach ethics, law, and public policy to veterinary students and consult to media companies about animal issues.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I believe a hand up is better than a hand out. Good luck to all the new entrepreneurs

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It's direct. It's powerful. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I interpret natural and human-created environments through a camera lens to create images that communicate my sense of wonder at the variety and beauty of the world around us.

lender.name: Janine & Gregg
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in other parts of the world build their own bright futures.
lender.occupational_info: We run a small software development company in the Pacific Northwest of the US.

lender.name: Jon Peterson
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have an idea but no money to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Painter

lender.name: Los Que Dan
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. The only way to make a difference in this world is to try, and if it's possible to make the lives of others better in the process then it's worth it.
lender.occupational_info: We're a Social 10 class at the Lethbridge Collegiate Institute in Alberta. We attend school full-time and are active participants in our community.

lender.name: Lora Jean
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to help them find ways to become more efficient and effective in their business processes.

lender.name: Rockroom Wine
lender.loan_because: eliminating poverty around the globe is an idea whose time has come; businesses like these will make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I started Rockroom Winemaking Cooperative where we make and share some great wine...and use the profits to fund Kiva loans! When I am not making wine I work in venture capital and corporate finance where entrepreneurs are building great businesses for the future.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I can and because it feels hopeful to provide someone else with a chance at bettering his/her circumstances in life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage information systems -- to help make people do their jobs more easily.

lender.name: Claire
lender.occupational_info: I research how companies treat their employees, the communities where they're located, the people that consumer their products, and the environment. I write summaries of a company's actions and rate how responsible it is. Then my firm sells that information to investors who only want to invest in responsible companies that treat the world well.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: When we invest in each other, we invest in our collective future.

lender.name: Josh & Marcy
lender.loan_because: Action is better than inaction
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect the legislative interests of members of the union.

lender.name: rico
lender.loan_because: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." -His Holiness the Dalai Lama. These loans are made in memoriam: Kelsang Namtso.
lender.occupational_info: Soy un obrero de acero retirio. Yo vivo en Oaxaca, Mexico ahora.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe most people only want a chance to do something to make a difference in their own lives and for their families.

lender.name: D. Skip
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together. Let's do our best to make it a better place for all of us.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have the opportunity to succeed and to be proud of their businesses. I've seen what a difference the loans can make for entrepreneurs and I appreciate the opportunity to help someone.

lender.name: Michael and Kim
lender.loan_because: .... we have been so blessed with opportunities. If we can help others to make their lives better through their own efforts, it helps repay the world for the wonders we enjoy.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: microloans make it possible for a regular American like me to have a direct impact on poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage internet businesses and projects.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent way of providing aide to humans while maintaining each individual's dignity and ability to be liberated from some difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher and assistant principal.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It is never the wrong time to do the right thing.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupational_info: I research water and sanitation in urban India.

lender.name: Masa
lender.loan_because: it is potentially long term help, whereas charity is one-time help.

lender.name: Mojo Mom
lender.loan_because: We can't count on governments to solve all the problems. Ordinary people have to reach out and help each other as we can!
lender.occupational_info: I help mothers discover their own sense of personal power and leadership, including an entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I believe there is value in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I proofread articles, take photographs and design newspaper pages for a local newspaper in eastern North Carolina, USA.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: As a former business coach, I helped people get into a business that matches up with their goals and needs through a unique discovery process. Many of my clients found a business they never would have found or considered except for working through me. Needless to say, I love my work.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it is a brilliant way to help redistribute global resources more justly

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe the world will be a better place when people can touch other people on a personal level. This is a powerful use of the internet.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy and world religions to university students in the US, Mexico, and Japan.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I would like to help these small entrepreneurs succeed and help build their neighborhoods, cities, and countries.
lender.occupational_info: I set up SAP Software Solutions for government agency's and large corporations.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to share my good fortune to help others throughout the world to grow and prosper. I also want it known that there are Americans who care about them and their growth.
lender.occupational_info: I try to discover new medicines to cure diseases.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: "We could have saved the Earth but we were too damned cheap." -Kurt Vonnegut
lender.occupational_info: Write documents to help business employees

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: Leverage! What makes a small difference in my life can make a big difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: Mt company works with non-profits to measure how they change the knowledge, attitudes and behavior of the people they serve: assessing impact.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microcredit and I want to do my part to help people succeed with their businesses.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I want the world to know that Americans aren't as bad as the current regime in Washington, and believe that entrepreneurship leads to self sufficiency, self sufficiency leads to stability, stability leads to peace
lender.occupational_info: I have been writing scripts for television shows, but am now starting my own book publishing company in India.

lender.name: Leonore
lender.loan_because: Though middle class by American standards, my family is very privileged according to world standards.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 10th grade World History and Geography.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I can....Also, my father taught me to help out our neighbors whenever possible
lender.occupational_info: I am a former photojournalist, who has seen a bit of the world. Right now I am teaching part time (photography and Spanish)

lender.name: Tony & Phyllis
lender.loan_because: The Dalai Lama says that the secret to happiness is to alleviate the suffering of others.
lender.occupational_info: Phyllis sells BMW's at a competitive, mostly male dealer. Tony manages stock portfolios for investors. Kiva helps us remember how lucky we are.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to help change someone else's life

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: People need help.
lender.occupational_info: I go to Moorpark College and I am currently studying to become a Narrator

lender.name: Mazzy and Rivers
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to make a positive difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Alice18
lender.loan_because: I have so much in life, and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I teach nutrition to college students, including some who will become dietitians. I used to counsel people with nutrition problems like diabetes and hypertension about how to eat.

lender.name: Lesli
lender.loan_because: I read the article in today's New York Times and I was inspired! Thank you Nicholas Kristof for bringing this terrific program to my attention.

lender.name: Adam Saltz
lender.occupational_info: University student studying mathematics

lender.name: Loris
lender.loan_because: I care and I can. I strive to do my best and I know I have been blessed with everything (and more) I need. It's sad that it's 2010 and innocent people still die of hunger and war. Join me in enpowering them to true freedom with work and education.
lender.occupational_info: Software Guru

lender.name: Violet
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful idea and I feel I'm doing something very positive.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who have asthma and other lung diseases.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have opportunities. I want to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: High tech geek

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: this is how WE will make a difference in the world.....

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I am interested in finding ways to help people with fewer advantages than I and my family have toward a better life. The Kiva loan program seems like one good way to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. My job before retirement was as a consultant, helping companies and government agencies improve their health care insurance programs.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a songline that traces its dreaming over the world, how can we not travel on this journey.
lender.occupational_info: Office Worker: Computor work, phone answerer...all around general office work. The person behind the scenes that keeps the copier and every thing else running.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: it works.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: it is the best use of personal resources
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers how to teach science and mathematics.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: Part of my job takes me to West and Southern Africa - this is such a fantastic way to build communities.
lender.occupational_info: Humanities technology

lender.name: Paulette
lender.occupation: Director, Asian and Comparative Law Programs
lender.loan_because:
I am happy to help such strong, capable people. I live in New York City and was here on 9/11. Like other New Yorkers we did what we could to help the victims and survivors of that attack. I am lending with the hope of bringing peace to the world.
I like to lend to people who are educating their daughters.
lender.occupational_info: I bring people together to exchange ideas about Chinese and Japanese law.

lender.name: Wyncia
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I am a sewer. I make mostly bag. I sell mostly at local craft fairs and shops. I have a store on the internet at www.wyncia.ETSY.com. I also work in energy conservation. I live in the foot hills of the Rocky Mountains.

lender.name: george and barbara witt
lender.loan_because: Kiva "cuts to the chase" in redistributing wealth from the "over-rewarded" to the "under-rewarded." It bypasses "governments."
lender.occupational_info: George - research and writing about the social evolution of precivilized humans. Barbara - Consolidating and improving the Schools of Nursing at Auburn University in Auburn and in Montgomery

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and its a good idea who's time has come.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: We are all connected, and it feels good to support someone, especially someone in another part of the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I write books for children

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a helping hand - I had one at a time in my life when I really needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for causes and organizations I believe are trying to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Trying to do my part

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to combat world poverty.

lender.name: Fred Mc
lender.loan_because: It seems to be the right thing to do for people in countries other than my own. While I have had many opportunities in my life, those blessings to not come to many who are just as deserving as I. Knowing there are people who care is a comforting feeling. Yes, it's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Monty
lender.loan_because: I want these people to be indebted to me forever. Muahahahaha

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I am excited about the idea of helping women around the world acheive dignity through work. When a woman succeeds, her children are fed and educated. In this way, these loans change the destiny of future generations.
lender.occupational_info: I write books for families interested in helping a loved one addicted to alcohol or other drugs.

lender.name: carla
lender.loan_because:
I believe most people would rather help themselves than be given a donation.
Good luck with your business!

lender.name: Lakshmi
lender.occupational_info: Doctor

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help now and then!
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults to understand how to be better at their jobs. I also work with them to learn more about the complexities of our society and how to work well with people who are different than themselves.

lender.name: Seth
lender.occupation: ONE Campaign/Bread for the World Organizer

lender.name: Crickett
lender.loan_because: I loan because this is not a handout but a hand up. I feel that building a strong middle class around the world is key to peace and security. If my little loan will help build that security, then the world is just that much better off; one family, one business at a time. Whether it is raising cattle and sheep, or weaving a rug, fixing a car or baking bread, someone always catches my eye because we have something in common. Small world isn't it?
lender.occupational_info: I work for the people who produce movies in Hollywood. I have fun by driving my Jeep in the desert, riding my motorcycle, and spinning wool into yarn and thread. I also own a wheat farm in Kansas.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea, it cuts the banks out of the deal, and it seems to work.
lender.occupational_info: i design electronics drives for electric motors

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Others have more urgent needs than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Raising and Caring for Livestock

lender.name: Tyrone
lender.loan_because: I have seen how small amounts of money can change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the geology of the great rift valley in East Africa and on how the rift will one day turn into an ocean.

lender.name: Valentine
lender.loan_because: I want to help women become empowered. Through them their children will lead better lives.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Most people complain about the sad state of our world and feel helpless to do anything about it.Kiva gives me an opportunity to make a difference and help someone to take control of her life.It is such a great feeling.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a music teacher and a craftsperson. I make papercrafts, jewelry and beautiful things for the home.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: dunno
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Brown Derby International Wine Center and plan to receive my masters degree in history this coming May

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I've had some amazing opportunities given to me during my lifetime and I feel like it's only fair for me to try and give others an opportunity as well.
lender.occupational_info: I support US Naval activities logistically, enabling them to support and defend democracy around the world.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra money, despite being a college student and want to do some good in the world and help people who are less well off than I am. I use Kiva because Nicholas Kristof recommended the site.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: People have been kind to me in the past. I wish to repay the kindnesses not by "paying it back" but by "paying it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 38 year old man who was a mechanic but I quit to go back to school to be a teacher someday.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I feel passionate about helping people to get a start and to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My work provides technology that helps people create designs to improve the things we use every day.

lender.name: Borat
lender.loan_because: I make the money. High-five!
lender.occupational_info:
Jagshemash, I like you! Do you like me? My name Borat. I from Kazakhstan. My hometown name Kuzcek. It near Almaty - please you visit!!!
I want meet nice western girlies for chitchat and sexytime - preference lady with yellow hairs, with plough experience and little or no history of retardation in family. I would like to meet you and make romance inside you.
If you agree be my wife then you will come my country, I will give you television with remote control, a red dress, two strong shoes, I will love you and care for you, we will be as one... but if u cheat on me I will crush you!
Also I like meet nice men, as friend - no sexytime.

lender.name: Michiel
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of entrepreneurship, and it is amazing to be able to interact with people halfway across the globe
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur in the Netherlands

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need and make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage technology projects for a large financial services firm.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It seems like a very smart, direct, and efficient way to share my good fortune with others around the world.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Our link to one another in the dignity of the human family demands it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a college teacher of young working adults seeking to advance their education. My work is to help them think, write and speak more authentically.

lender.name: Jim & The Mighty Mo
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save their money in the best ways possible.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can make a difference, however small, in the life of some less fortunate than I've been.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now. I now live on a few acres of land in Texas where I garden and plant flowers and try to enjoy life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe small business enterprise is the engine of any economy, and because women need the opportunity to be self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a University professor and management consultant. I teach young people and managers how to be ethical, practical, humanistic leaders.

lender.name: virginia
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good investment to help industrious people who are trying to help themselves. Successful businesses bring prosperity to all in the long run.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, self-employed physician

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: Our home is the whole World, not just our backyard.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I was helped when I was a struggling young mom trying to support my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I am at home and I take care of my home, go to church and pray with the sick.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mutimedia consultant. I sell both yellow pages advertising and internet optimization.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business owners in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have 3 families for whom I cook on a regular basis. I go to my clients' homes and prepare 3-4 meals in their kitchen and store them in the refrigerator. My clients are usually busy people who like home cooked food but do not have a lot of time to prepare it for themselves.

lender.name: Cassius
lender.loan_because: sometimes a little capital can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: Financial markets

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It's an important and effective way of fighting poverty.
lender.occupational_info: When people have a stroke, sometimes they can't talk well. I help them talk better after their stroke.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Georgetown University in Washington, DC.

lender.name: harmfuljays
lender.loan_because: "What is good? All that heightens the feeling of power in man, the will to power, power itself. What is bad? All that is born of weakness. What is happiness? The feeling that power is growing, that resistance is overcome." -Nietzsche

lender.name: Arpy
lender.loan_because: of Nicholas Kristof (NYT 3/27/07)

lender.name: LEigh
lender.loan_because: What a small difference in my life can make a huge one is someone elses. I have the responsibility to give as I have so much.
lender.occupational_info: I help woman with their reproductive health care questions and concerns. To choose when to get pregnant gives women control over their lives.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: even though I have no other god-like powers, I do seek to help those who help themselves. Also, this is the kind of wealth redistribution I can get behind without becoming a socialist.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company to understand and comply with laws and regulations in its Canadian operations.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I actually started an informal microlending circle for one individual in Kenya whom I happened to meet (a former student of mine), and I got together a group of people to lend him 2500 dollars to buy a house for his family and for renting out portions of for income to support his children's school fees. It seemed so easy to get a small amount together from a large group of people in the North, and make a big difference in one person's family. When he pays it back we will lend to someone else, but finding suitable people who can use the money is quite a chore, apart from such happenstance personal contacts. When I heard about Kiva on the New York Times, this seemed the answer!
lender.occupational_info: I translate books on history, law, anthropology, and politics into English (from French, Hungarian or Dutch). I work in an office for an agency and also do some translation on a freelance basis, as an independent businessperson.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to know where my donation is going, and I want to provide a means for someone to become financially self sufficient. I know how important that is to me, and although my desire for fiscal freedom from parents is vastly different than true poverty, the basis of the desire to be self-sufficient is similar- the desire for dignity and accomplishment.
lender.occupational_info: I study genetic sciences, and I hope someday to hold an MD/PhD and work in medical research, with the possibility of working with organizations like Doctors without Borders.

lender.name: Broddi
lender.loan_because: I've always been incredibly impressed with the idea of microcredit and been interested in getting involved directly, but never really did anything about it, until now.
lender.occupational_info: Civil servant

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I understand what it means to them.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find God inside of themselves. I also help America find Truth.

lender.name: Julius
lender.loan_because: The sharing of welfare is key to our shared future in the world, and I want to put my wallet where my mouth is (to some extent)!
lender.occupational_info: I work on communication and signal processing technology for geophysical applications (in particular, for oilfield remote measurement systems).

lender.name: stephan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: i'm the author of two books, working on a third.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I have been interested in microfinance since I met Muhammed Yunus in 1992, and I am thrilled to have the opportunity to participate in helping people grow their own businesses and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am also a small business owner. I sell baby slings and carriers so that parents can carry their babies hands-free and get their work done!

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: It's easy and useful.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It's important to loan because other people not in America may not be as fortunate as me. If we help people we must remember that we are being rewarded, rewarded with good feelings.

lender.name: Lisandra
lender.loan_because: Encouraging enterprise is the best way to break the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Research for Steven Levitt, author of Freakonomics.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in nutrition to help people eat healthy food.

lender.name: Raina&Chris
lender.loan_because: we are honored to have the ability to help
lender.occupational_info: We live in a small tourist town in hawaii. Chris is a waiter at a resort, Raina works in a dive shop.

lender.name: nina
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit and perserverance of these fine people.
lender.occupational_info: I am artist who uses a camera to express the way i see beauty in people, places and everyday objects.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Rev. Jennifer
lender.loan_because: All human beings have inherent worth, and everyone deserves the opportunity to develop their full potential. Anyone born into life circumstances that allow this flowering of the human spirit must recognize that others, no less deserving, are born into more difficult life circumstances that limit their opportunities. Those of us with "more" in material wealth have an obligation to work for justice and to honor the unfulfilled promise of other human beings. Distributed lending has a direct impact on the life circumstances of other human beings, increasing their well-being in ways that they choose and control.
lender.occupational_info: I am the spiritual leader of a congregation of about 400 members and friends. Sharing a commitment to living in a way that enhances justice in the world and supports our own growth as compassionate beings, we come from a variety of religious traditions. Our faith has its roots in Protestant Christianity, yet our members bring their own theologies to shelter under one roof of values. Buddhists, Jews, Muslims, followers of Earth-centered traditions, and Christians find a home in Unitarian Universalist worship and ethical practices.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe those who have the means to help others should do so. I am lucky to be able to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help people regain their language and thinking skills after a stroke or head injury.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I think it makes sense. We all need to make a better world bit by bit together.
lender.occupational_info: I help a Japanese lawyer work with clients in the US and Japan.

lender.name: Ron & Linda
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference in the lives of people in a very direct way.
lender.occupational_info: We have both spent our working lives in the field of special education - working with students with disabilities.

lender.name: Barbara H
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy and interesting and personal way to be helpful -- and since there's a good likelihood of being paid back, it really doesn't cost anything except a few cents of foregone interest -- and the return in feeling good about doing good is worth so much more!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired professor of linguistics (the science of language), but I still teach part time, both in my university in the US and as a visiting professor in Moscow. My Russian husband and I are helping to "build bridges" between Russian linguistics and American linguistics. It's an exciting life!

lender.name: Ana Gabriela
lender.loan_because: Being from Mexico I know how a small amount of money for someone, can make an enormous difference in some else's business.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is such an amazing idea. I can't think of a more meaningful way to utilize my resources. I feel immensely lucky to be able to lend, and I am truly inspired by the businesses I now support. Thanks to Kiva, even though they are far across the world, we are all near like neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer graphics artist. I make fanciful, imaginary landscapes and objects as beautiful as I can using the computer.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to do something practical to help people in need.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel so grateful that I am able to support myself and also help my children and grandchildren. I want to enable others to enjoy life, as much as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I now teach teachers, after teaching children for 30 years.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: To continue the empowerment of the receipients, helping them to realize their potential. Trying to follow Gandhi's immortal words to 'Be the change you wish to see in the world' -

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to provide opportunities for people to improve their lives through entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Roberta & Bruce
lender.loan_because: We are pleased to be a part of Kiva; and send our best wishes to all other partners, both entrepreneurs and lenders, whose efforts combine to make our world a better place for all of us.

lender.name: Konrad
lender.loan_because: Helping is a thing of beauty
lender.occupational_info: Run company that makes and hosts websites, databases, cms, blogs and so forth

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I make video games that hopefully you'll play one day.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: This is such an incredible way to directly help people half way around the world. There is probably no better way to help developing countries achieve sustainable economic progress than by providing support to their industrious entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Is there a way to search by country? I would love to also help small business owners in Iraq and Afghanistan.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a newspaper editor -- I write headlines, edit stories, write photo captions and help decide which stories go on the front page.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people build a life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics at Boston University.

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: I fyou can, you must

lender.name: Denise
lender.occupational_info: Teaching physicians how to listen and communicate better with patients and their families.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: Do what you can do!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Because I've got enough stuff (not that I'll actually stop buying stuff) and I have the chance with this program to help people who are willing to work to better their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the public school system, supervising a small group who work with teachers to deal with children whose behavior interferes with the educational process.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I like to.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of the flight crew on airplanes. Note the Kiva button on my apron in my photo.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I would like to personally make some sort of difference in this world while I'm still alive, and I'd like to do so in a tangible way, no matter how big or small.
lender.occupational_info: I make visual effects for movies.

lender.name: january
lender.loan_because: i am

lender.name: Jaidee
lender.loan_because: this is the best way that I can think of for an average person to help in the fight against global poverty...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, soldier, and sometime global traveler...

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: many people have helped me get to where I am.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make websites.

lender.name: Mohammad
lender.loan_because: I never knew of Kiva until my Economics professor told me about it. When I came to the page, I said, "These people need help, and they need it now." I loan because I know that it will help in what they are doing in business and in life.
lender.occupational_info: You have to give a little to people to make sure that they have something to give to the community - it's a short formula: I give to them - they sell products - they have food on the table and clothes on their back and a roof over their head at night. That makes me feel good.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected."
lender.occupational_info: Market research is the collection and analysis of information about consumers, competitors and the effectiveness of marketing programs used to determine the feasibility of a new business, test levels of interest in new products, and develop strategies to improve customer service and distribution channels.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference for someone and I'm still getting by...
lender.occupational_info: I write for newspapers

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I write for television and movies.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve health care ... retired as a physician executive and now do what I can for our health foundation.

lender.name: Marika
lender.loan_because: I loan rather than donate because there are people willing to try, rather than just take.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: parce que je peux

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I loan because your success matters to me. I loan because I can and care. For me, it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I run a computer software company

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: It is a great thing to do. I love the idea of helping someone with a small loan. The benefit over a gift is the increase of the self esteem of the recipient as they pay back the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell metal.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women in Latin America

lender.name: chrissie & caroline
lender.loan_because: we can

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I am a Civil Rights Attorney.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: Kiva has been deceiving us. I will loan again when Kiva promises to send the money to the person I picked. until then I stick to supporting the panhandlers on the street, this way at least I know who gets the money, and nobody else takes a cut.

lender.name: F. X.
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to try and start a business with little or no access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the use of technology at my company, which provides insurance for people's homes against the risk of fire or damage. I have to know about computers, phones, and so forth.

lender.name: Harris
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to live comfortably in the United States and would like to give other people willing to work hard a chance to advance their lives and livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: I work for New York State--the State that has the City of New York in it. I am a senior level manager for one of the State's most important agencies.

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life during their voyage in Planet Earth.
lender.occupational_info: I renovate houses and I love to see happy clients at the end of my work.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I hope my small contribution can help make their lives better. I respect people who work hard to better themselves and to be self sufficient so that they can care for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with critically ill new born infants.

lender.name: Rudmila
lender.loan_because: kiva and e-microfinance is a great idea!students like me can now contribute to development in low-resource communities and change the lives of people we would have otherwise never heard about.
lender.occupational_info: Graduating Senior at Brown University, USA.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Even though I don't have a lot of money my U.S. standards, I have a lot of money by most people's standards. Now that Kiva has made it so easy to loan money to real entrepreneurs in the developing world, I have a moral responsibility to provide what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at college: philosophy, political science, international affairs, and science and technology policy.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I work to regulate various financial markets, preventing fraud and manipulation. We ensure that people are treated fairly when they invest money in the US Capital Markets.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: i can't understand how so much of the world, especially this country, can be so rich, while there are so many, so hungry
lender.occupational_info: self employed

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a way to achieve more equality in the world.

lender.name: Irene
lender.occupation: Volunteer at a local animal shelter
lender.loan_because: I like to see hard-working people succeed.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I help groups and meetings work better.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: In addition to the standard "help people" line I also think it's near mind-boggling that I am able to loan money across the globe that just might make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My job consists of warping young minds and generally corrupting the youth.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I've grown up surrounded by grinding poverty and this is a small way in which I can help others.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It empowers others to become self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have emotional or learning disabilities.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe the planet is enriched whenever we choose to be brought together by trust and confidence in each other. And I am grateful for the privilege of helping to advance an enterprise that demands courage, dedication and ingenuity, and that may some day fulfill a dream.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to empower people.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a new home sales associate.
Soy una agente de ventas de casas nuevas.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to build on their dreams and am inspired by the effect this can have on the entire community. I am so happy to be able to help in some small way!
lender.occupational_info: I'm earning a law degree so I can work to improve legal protection for animals.

lender.name: Lindsey and Jeff
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world."

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that even as a small lender I can join with others to make a difference in the life of a specific person.
lender.occupational_info: I write health-education materials in plain language for people with limited English proficiency. I am also an ESL volunteer.

lender.name: sharmila
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: i treat injured and critically ill patients

lender.name: Gregory Amour
lender.loan_because: We need to share our resources. We need to create a chain of love and prosperity. We need to change our planet through hope and faith in others like ourselves. We need to create seeds of Peace so we can reap the reality of thriving together.
lender.occupational_info: Managing the resouces of a small company and the productivity and effeciency of a staff.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I think this is the way to make a difference, not by throwing some change in a basket but donating to a concerted effort that will really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am an auditor for the government which helps me try to save the governement money and to prevent waste of funds which could help in many ways all round the world and the US.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so many opportunities and I want to share that blessing with others. As a woman who entered a profession that had very few women, I feel a special responsibility to reach out and help women.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: As a Christian, I care about the world's poor. I don't do enough, but I'm working to change that.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It's a direct way to help people who are working hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small library. It serves working people who take university courses at night.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: helping others is a great thing.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: want to help others prosper

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public library, helping people find books and information.

lender.name: Jonathan and Jill
lender.occupation: Investments and Stay at home Mom

lender.name: Brock
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ramses
lender.loan_because: So little from me can creates so much happiness for them...
lender.occupational_info: Mathematics Grad Student

lender.name: Patrick Lynch
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to encourage and empower individual initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I design Web sites for Yale University, and I'm an artist and photographer.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to launder the proceeds from my lawn-chair recycling scheme.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in warping the perceptions of the maasses of behalf of my clients.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: It sounds like a great idea. I hope it helps someone. it is edifying to read peoples' stories and in some small way imagine being a part of their fate.
lender.occupational_info: I help operate a train from Sacramento to Klamath Falls.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I learned about microlending at a Model United Nations Conference, and have been enamored by the idea ever since. As a citizen of the world, I feel a responsibility to help people living in developing countries. Microlending is wonderful way of doing so, because, unlike aid, microloans have the potential to permanently elevate people from the depths of poverty by giving them a means to build businesses and become self-sufficient rather than simply bandaging the problem. There is a ripple effect, because entrepreneurs who built their businesses using microloans create new job and stimulate their fledgling economies, helping to stabilize their societies.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in high school who will be attending Yale University in the fall to study political science and international relations.

lender.name: william brooks
lender.loan_because:
This couldn't be cooler or easier....Finally, the entirety of my help will go to the ones in most need.
I am also reminded of "Give someone a fish, you feed them for a day. Teach someone to fish, you feed them for a lifetime".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Real Estate Salesperson. My areas of focus are The Upper West Side and The Upper East Side of Manhattan. I am also an author and songwriter.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping themselves with a little help from us.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to introduce renewable energy from Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion (OTEC). See tjplocek videos at youtube.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I am an American living in Armenia and this is a small way to assist in the economic development of this country.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an international organization assisting in the development of the Armenian legal system

lender.name: Geanncarlo
lender.loan_because: "The Chemist who can extract from his heart's elements compassion, respect, longing, patience, regret, surprise and forgiveness, and compound them into one, can create that atom which is called LOVE." by Kahlil Gibran
lender.occupational_info: I am a person who studies how the human body defends itself against harmful pathogens such as bacteria, viruses, worms, among other agents of disease. I seek to understand how the body works to implement a cure and improve therapy to different diseases that affect human kind.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I hope to help
lender.occupational_info: building houses

lender.name: Tessa
lender.occupational_info: I work in the agricultural sector.

lender.name: Vincent, Cindy & Sons
lender.occupation: OR Nurse, SAP Consultant, Film Editor, Students
lender.loan_because: "The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little" - FDR

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It is time I started giving back to a world that has given me more than I can ever appreciate.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Wow, what a great idea!

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: To pass on some of the support I've experienced in my life to others.

lender.name: Biren
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Operate a store that sells Video Games and Animated Movies to many happy customers.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: It's personal and it helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an English teacher in Japan.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: allowing people to support their families through their work is an expression of my deep and abiding sense of social and economic justice.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students to become social workers.

lender.name: Aiyana
lender.loan_because: I like to
lender.occupational_info: Friend in Need

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I can help people make good lives for themselves and their families directly, without intermediaries.
lender.occupational_info: I work with writers on their short stories to make them better and then publish them in anthologies that I edit.

lender.name: Mike & Stacy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who, like us, are self-employed.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I want to help and know that the money is really getting to where it is needed. It feels personal in a wonderful way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach/facilitate parent education groups, helping people to be the best parents they can be. I try to help parents see things from their child's point of view; it makes everything better when people understand each other!

lender.name: Michael de Zayas
lender.loan_because: I should and can
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneur and writer living in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, New York City

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: Any bit that we can do to help others matters much more than we think.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Public Diplomacy--how people-to-people communication can promote mutual understanding and prevent conflict.

lender.name: Navid Tofigh
lender.loan_because: I studied urban economic development and I have seen micro-finance work first hand on an internship I did in Ghana, West Africa.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: Accessing capital is the biggest obstacle to gaining self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Barend Frielink
lender.loan_because: people need credit to get ahead in life. This is a very cost effective way to be directly involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a development bank that mainly lends to governments for development projects.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to connect. I grew up in a family business---loans allowed us to buy and maintain equipment and saved us when cash flow was uncertain.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychiatrist: I treat mental illnesses like depression with psychotherapy and medication.

lender.name: Marian & Hilda
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a choral conductor who teaches and edits choir music from around the world.

lender.name: Milana
lender.loan_because: We (individuals, organizations like kiva.org, and entrepreneurs) can do this much more effectively than goverments can.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: helping others when I can is the best way to ensure that when I need help, the world helps me, too. It's pretty amazing that these relatively small loans are significant to others. Everyone benefits from giving and receiving help. Great that the Internet enables micro-helping.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It helps our fellow mankind.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the installation of phone lines and data service for small, medium and large business.

lender.name: Saverio
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is one of the best ways to share with others what I have and to have a more personal connection with charitable activities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher and volunteer at The Gamble House [an architecturally-significant Greene and Greene house] in Pasadena, CA.

lender.name: Lysa
lender.loan_because: I think that it is a good way to help others.

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: It's a great concept and i am interested in tracking the impact of programs like this one.
lender.occupational_info: I serve in elected position as part of town government on Long Island, NY.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It puts money in the hands of local people who need seed money to become independent and have the possibility of creating paying local jobs that will enable those involved to educate their children and break the poverty cycle they were born into.
lender.occupational_info: I value and assess commercial real estate in my metropolitan area.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: I teach sociology and try to practice social justice.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam

lender.name: Kent and Chele
lender.loan_because: We want all people to be able to live the best life they possibly can.

lender.name: Saskia
lender.loan_because: giving a little money can give a lot of hope and positive outlook towards the future! It is a wonderful opportunity to help people make their dreams and ideas come true.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It gives me a way to help people in far-off places that I would otherwise never know. It helps me to appreciate how fortunate I am to live where I do, and to better understand the lives of people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I do consulting work in sales, management and marketing. I figure out how to sell products and services in complex, technical or unusual environments. One product I sell helps hospitals to reduce blood loss during surgery, and saves lives.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life with money I wouldn't otherwise notice spending.
lender.occupational_info: My company offers expert witness testimony in securities fraud litigation cases. We also offer testimony in anti-trust cases.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupation: Progressive pastor, and founder Latino Work Center

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves, especially women in the developing world, is a great way to improve their lives.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: If I have the money and someone needs it, why shouldn't I? It mostly just sits in the bank not helping anyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a technology consultant in New York City. I help companies to evaluate and to improve how they use technology. It involves a fair amount of travel, but hey, I've got the time.

lender.name: VRA
lender.loan_because: Everything we need in life is an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Searching cure for genetic disease using DNA.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: its fun!

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a sustainable way to help.

lender.name: Mack-Jones Family
lender.loan_because: While the Bush (aka "The Decider") administation has done its part to destory the reputation of American I believe strongly in the power of the American individual to help and promote the peace around the world. We loan because as a family we are conducting our own "war" not against terror but poverty and ignorance.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family two educators and one student (our daughter) and have devoted our lives to education and the advancement of ideas. Teaching allows us to help and serve the community in which we live. We hope this small loan will help play a part in the success of others.

lender.name: Rob & Laurie Marchiony
lender.loan_because: With great privilege comes great responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: Rob works as an attorney and Laurie is a stay-at-home mom. We're also building our fortune part-time as consultants for Ambit Energy. Our part-time income has enabled us to support many more entrepreneurs through Kiva.

lender.name: Uma Simon
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people empower themselves.

lender.name: Baldwin Family
lender.occupational_info: brothers

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: It is exciting and gratifying to be able to give a helping hand to a hard-working business person in need.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and manage medical office buildings.

lender.name: Torrey
lender.loan_because:
Two percent of the world's richest individuals control half its wealth.
There's something wrong with that.
lender.occupational_info: I write for newspapers and magazines.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because:
I basically just try to do whatever Nick Kristof says.
Also it's nice to see that the dollar is still worth something somewhere on this earth.
